articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: Grayscale is currently battling the SEC regarding the future legal status of its funds, as its GBTC and ETHE products trade at a discount.
articles.title: Grayscale Ethereum Trust Trades at Record 60% Low Against Ethereum

articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: The legal action comes as Genesis parent company Digital Currency Group (DCG) faces mounting pressure from crypto exchange Gemini.
articles.title: Gemini Earn Users Pursue Class-Action Arbitration Over Genesis-DCG 'Sham Transaction'

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: The former Bithumb chairman has been cleared of wrongdoing relating to the shambolic 2018 Bithumb Coin token sale.
articles.title: Former Bithumb Chairman Lee Jung-Hoon Not Guilty: Report

articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: After flipping MakerDAO, Lido Finance is now the largest DeFi protocol in terms of total value locked, as liquid staking gains momentum post-merge.
articles.title: Lido Finance Up 8% After Overtaking MakerDAO’s TVL

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: The Bahamas Securities Commission responded to ‘unfounded’ claims in the latest in an ongoing war of words with FTX’s new management.
articles.title: Bahamas Regulator Hits Back at ‘Cavalier’ New FTX Bosses

articles.description: In December 2022 at Art Basel in Miami, Decrypt Studios held the inaugural Crypties awards gala. With emcee Josh Ostrovsky ("The Fat Jewish") and presenters from a range of crypto projects, statuettes were awarded in nine categories. The evening was sponsored by Polygon, Filecoin Foundation, Lamina1, Async, BeetsDAO, The Gold Mask, Gem Set, Breakout, Anonymous, Infinite Objects, Ape Water, Decentralized Pictures, and Vault 721.
articles.title: The Crypties 2022: Highlight Reel

articles.author: Daniel Roberts
articles.description: Crypto ended the year on an abysmal streak of bankruptcies and price declines. But 2022 still had some silver linings and reasons for bullishness.
articles.title: 2022 Wasn't All Bad for Crypto (Just Mostly)

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Square Enix isn’t deterred by the crypto bear market or gamer pushback, plotting multiple blockchain-powered games ahead.
articles.title: Final Fantasy Maker Square Enix Reaffirms Focus on Blockchain Games

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Cameron Winklevoss penned an open letter over funds reportedly owed to Gemini Earn customers; Barry Silbert denies the accusations.
articles.title: Gemini’s Winklevoss Slams DCG CEO Silbert for ‘Bad Faith Stall Tactics’ Over $900M in Locked Funds

articles.author: Stephen Graves
articles.description: The popular decentralized exchange has announced plans to deprecate its lending protocol Kashi, and its token launchpad Miso.
articles.title: SushiSwap Axes Lending Protocol and Token Launchpad

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The two biggest cryptocurrencies have climbed slightly in the past 24 hours, but remain down on the week after an inauspicious end to 2022.
articles.title: Bitcoin and Ethereum Start 2023 in the Green—But Only Slightly

articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: Despite the recent boost, Solana is down almost 20% over the past month as many SOL-based projects migrate to pastures new.
articles.title: Solana Jumps Double Digits to Reclaim $11

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Luke Dashjr said his PGP key was compromised, resulting in the theft of over 200 BTC—worth upwards of $3.6 million.
articles.title: Bitcoin Core Dev Loses At Least $3.6 Million in BTC to Hack

articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: Metaverse and gaming tokens have started the New Year on a high note, while games giant Square Enix has doubled down on blockchain.
articles.title: Metaverse Tokens ApeCoin, Axie Infinity Ring in New Year With 6% Surge

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: SBF returns to Twitter, Avraham Eisenberg is busted, and Manchester United gets accused of NFT art plagiarism.
articles.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Did SBF Move Money? Man Utd NFTs Under Fire. Eisenberg Arrested!

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Bitcoin and Ethereum slid less than 2% in the final week of a brutal year for crypto prices; SOL and DOGE fell much harder.
articles.title: Bitcoin and Ethereum Flat in Final Week of 2022, Solana and Dogecoin Down Bad

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: SBF tweeted for the first time since December 12 to push back against speculation that he moved Alameda funds.
articles.title: Sam Bankman-Fried Denies Moving Alameda-Linked Funds: ‘None of These Are Me’

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: After a dispute that spilled out onto social media this summer, Compass has emerged victorious—but Dynamics vows to appeal the ruling.
articles.title: Bitcoin Firm Compass Mining Wins $1.5M in Suit Against Dynamics Mining

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The FTX founder and former CEO will reportedly enter a not guilty plea to eight charges of fraud from U.S. authorities.
articles.title: Sam Bankman-Fried Expected to Plead Not Guilty on FTX Fraud Charges

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: A group of FTX customers from outside the United States doesn't want to be named in the crypto exchange's bankruptcy proceedings.
articles.title: FTX Customers Owed $1.9B Ask Court to Keep Their Names Secret

articles.author: Mason Marcobello
articles.description: Tokenized artwork and collectibles actually predate the Ethereum NFT boom. Here's a look at the Bitcoin-based Counterparty protocol.
articles.title: What Is Counterparty? Historical NFTs Built on Bitcoin

articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: The volatile meme coin is shedding value as 2022 comes to a close, amid chatter over a potential proof-of-stake transition ahead.
articles.title: Dogecoin Plummets 13% Amid Rumors of Ethereum-Like Merge

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Ark Invest has once again moved to purchase cheap Coinbase stock, adding $5.5 million worth of COIN shares to its ARK Fintech Innovation ETF (ARKF).
articles.title: Cathie Wood's Ark Invest Buys the Dip, Scoops Up $5.5M in Coinbase Stock

articles.description: The confirmation comes as tensions remain about the Bahamian regulators' role in FTX’s ongoing legal issues.
articles.title: Bahamas Securities Commission Confirms It Has $3.5B in FTX Assets

articles.description: FTX Japan is developing systems to enable customers to recover their stuck assets via local crypto exchange Liquid Japan.
articles.title: FTX Japan to Refund Customers Starting February 2023

articles.description: Demand for the ex-president’s Polygon NFTs has vanished, with both sales volume and prices falling sharply.
articles.title: Trump NFTs Crater With Daily Sales Down 98% From Peak

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Once among the most valuable cryptocurrencies on the market, SOL has shed 97% of its value since its peak and is falling fast.
articles.title: Solana Slides Another 16% and Falls Out of Top 20

articles.description: Many major industry executives resigned or were removed as the bear market set in and contagion took hold.
articles.title: Biggest Crypto CEO Exits of 2022

articles.description: The country’s central bank has completed the first tests of its CBDC.
articles.title: Turkey Pushes Ahead With Digital Lira

articles.description: Wallets linked to Sam Bankman-Fried's Alameda Research are swapping and transferring crypto funds, using coin mixers to obscure transactions.

articles.description: If the first half of 2022 showed green shoots for the crypto industry, the second half snuffed out optimism of another bull run.
articles.title: The Year in Crypto, 2022 Part 2: Ethereum Merges, Feds Sanction Tornado Cash, FTX Collapses

articles.description: The state-backed marketplace will serve as a secondary trading platform for what China refers to as digital collectibles.
articles.title: China to Roll Out State-Backed Exchange for Digital Collectibles

articles.description: With Bitcoin mining’s fossil fuel use on the rise, the Bitcoin mining pool is on a mission to reduce the industry’s carbon footprint.
articles.title: Pega Pool Aims to Make Bitcoin Mining Eco-Friendly With Carbon Offsets

articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: Coinbase has made significant efforts to keep several different cases limited to arbitration and out of federal courts in recent months.
articles.title: Coinbase Customers Block Attempts to Move Lawsuit to Arbitration

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The price of Solana's native cryptocurrency fell another 6% on Thursday, pulling other tokens in the ecosystem down with it.
articles.title: Solana-Based Tokens Tumble as ‘Ethereum Killer’ Continues Slide

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The move intends to provide Celsius’ account holders with additional time to file potential proofs of claim.
articles.title: Bankrupt Celsius Seeks to Extend Claims Deadline for Burned Users

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: After insisting for days that victims had simply fallen for phishing attacks, the platform’s CEO said he is “sorry that this has gotten so far.”
articles.title: 3Commas Admits It Was Source of API Leak That Led to Hacks

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Seth Green’s production company built a Nouns-inspired float and costumed characters for next week’s pre-Rose Bowl festivities.
articles.title: Nouns Ethereum NFTs Will Appear in 2023 Rose Parade

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: An estimated $650 million worth of crypto went missing after FTX declared bankruptcy, and now U.S. authorities are reportedly investigating.
articles.title: US Department of Justice Investigating Massive FTX Hack: Report

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: From goblins to Nouns to penguins to Reddit Snoos, these NFT projects made waves in 2022 amid the speculative noise.
articles.title: Most Impressive NFT Projects of 2022

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: SOL has dropped a further 29% this month after taking a hard hit amid the FTX collapse, plus Solana’s top NFT projects are moving on.
articles.title: Solana Sinks Below $10 for First Time in Nearly Two Years

articles.description: Zora sees itself as more than just an NFT marketplace; its next era is about helping people easily launch a DAO. Zora Co-founder Jacob Horne joined Dan Roberts and Andrew Hayward to talk competition, the NFT speculative boom and bust, how Zora and Nouns are connected, and why Zora thinks DAOs are the future. Watch Episode 27 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Zora Looks Beyond NFTs to DAO Creation

articles.description: Tezos co-founder Kathleen Breitman talks about how the Tezos blockchain has used a proof-of-stake mechanism since its inception, her admiration for Tendermint, Ethereum and sharding, progressive decentralization, and NFT gaming with Decrypt's Stephen Graves onstage at Web Summit in Lisbon.
articles.title: How Tezos Was Ahead of the Proof-of-Stake Merge: Web Summit 2022

articles.description: SEC Commissioner Hester Peirce has been an outspoken advocate for crypto and a candid critic of her own agency’s approach to regulating crypto markets. In an extensive chat with Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott she discussed FTX, Gary Gensler, DeFi, and the problems with the Howey Test. Don’t miss this conversation for the inside take on the SEC’s thinking on crypto—straight from the source. Watch Episode 25 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: SEC Commissioner Hester Peirce Critiques SEC's Approach to Crypto

articles.description: Tezos co-founder Kathleen Breitman has been in crypto since the beginning and has seen a lot of cycles and failures. She joined Stacy Elliott and Dan Roberts and brought the fire on FTX and Sam Bankman-Fried’s mismanagement, “decentralization theater,” Tezos’s reputation and positioning, crypto sports marketing, and NFTs. Watch Episode 25 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Tezos Co-Founder Kathleen Breitman Sounds Off on FTX Collapse

articles.description: Clay Robbins of Slow Ventures, Soona Amhaz of Volt Capital, Sarah Guo of Conviction and formerly Greylock, and Alex Strzesniewski of AngelBlock joined Decrypt's Jason Nelson at 0xpo Summit in San Francisco on November 3 for an extensive panel on raising venture money even during Crypto Winter.
articles.title: Raising in a Bear Market: Slow Ventures, Volt Capital, Conviction, AngelBlock at 0xpo Summit

articles.description: Illa Da Producer accepted the Cryptie on behalf of Yuga Labs from presenter Alanna Roazzi-Laforet at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Moonbirds, Azuki, DeGods, and CloneX.
articles.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: Bored Ape Yacht Club Wins NFT Project of the Year

articles.description: Art Blocks founder Erick Calderon accepted the industry achievement award from presenter Clara Tsao of Filecoin Foundation at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30.
articles.title: The Crypties 2022: Art Blocks Founder Wins Industry Achievement Award

articles.description: Rachel Weiss and Jackie Courtney accepted the Cryptie for BFF from presenter Rebecca Barkin of Lamina1 at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were WomenRise, Boys Club, and The Hug.
articles.title: The Crypties 2022: BFF Wins Diversity Award

articles.description: Katrina Wolfe accepted the Cryptie for Crypto Unicorns from presenter Avery Akkineni of Vayner3 at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Stepn, Zed Run, and Blankos Block Party.
articles.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: Crypto Unicorns Wins Game of the Year

articles.description: Marek Olszewski accepted the Cryptie for Celo from presenter Dan Roberts of Decrypt Media at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Ukraine DAO, Dream DAO, Proof of Protest, and Digital Diaspora.
articles.title: The Crypties 2022: Celo Wins Social Impact Award

articles.description: Shirley Cedeno and Akbar Hamid accepted the Cryptie on behalf of Doodles from presenters Igor Lilic and Gabriela Ramos Lilic of Breakout at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were RTFKT and Nike, Gmoney and Adidas, Tiffany and CryptoPunks, and TIMEpieces.
articles.title: The Crypties 2022: Doodles Collab With Shopify Wins Mainstream Award

articles.description: Simone Berry and Akbar Hamid accepted the Cryptie for People of Crypto's Metaverse Pride Parade from presenter Toni Thai Sterrett of Bad Grrls Creative Club at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Decentraland's Metaverse Fashion Week and Heal from The Sandbox and Code Green.
articles.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: People of Crypto Wins Metaverse Event of the Year

articles.description: Bradley Freeman and Christina Beltramini accepted the Cryptie for Lens Protocol from presenter Jordan Garbis of BeetsDAO at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Aave, dYdX, and OlympusDAO.
articles.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: Lens Protocol Wins DeFi Project of the Year

articles.description: Shan Aggarwal accepted the Cryptie for Coinbase Ventures from presenter Amanda Cassatt of Serotonin at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Paradigm, a16z, and Polychain.
articles.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: Coinbase Ventures Wins Investor of the Year
